activities: Burke, Inc. receives HR and personal data of employees, employee applicants, customers and other data from client companies for which we have a contractual relationship for research and consulting services.  Burke receives individual data collected via telephone interviews, personal interviews and online interviews from various European and U.S. sources.  The data is compiled and reported for marketing research analysis.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Burke adheres to the Marketing Research Privacy Policy as defined by the industry trade organization (CASRO - Council of American Survey Organizations) and the privacy policy as defined by the MRA (Marketing Research Association).
